text: hananimkkeseo gyesileul naelisa gajang aleumdaun malsseum-eulo seongseoleul jusyeossnani ttaeloneun seolo yusahage hayeo ttaeloneun banbog hasyeossdeola ju nim-eul dulyeowo han jadeul-ui pibuneun tteolligo geuleon hu geudeul-ui pibuwa ma-eum-eun hananim-eul chanmiham-eulo pyeon-anhayeo jinani geugeos-i balo hananim-ui bog-eum-ila hananim-eun geubun-i wonhaneunjaleul indohasina banghwangke hagoja wonhaneun ja geuegeneun annaejaga eobs nola
